document_data.mainbody:
century DR
Sendrils Silks was a silk merchants shop in the town of Ormath of the Shining Plains in the 14 century DR.
As of the 14 century DR, Sendrils Silks was ran by Ucharntar Sendril. According to Elminster Aumars investigation, Ucharntar was one of the most active agents of the Cult of Tiamat at the time. The old wizard informed the Harpers of his findings and recommended for the agents to watch Sendrils Silks as the cults shillings indicated inevitable expansion into Sembia and Westgate.
